text:
I have a working installation of Apache 2.0.59 and PHP 4.4.7, and I am trying 
to update to Apache 2.0.61. It installed OK according to the install log, but 
the service will not start due to some sort of error. The only information I 
can find is in the Dr Watson log which shows "Exception number: c0000005 
(access violation)"
creator: tony@marston-home.demon.co.uk

text:
http://httpd.apache.org/dev/debugging.html gives info on getting a crash dump.

FYI - it's not a php support forum.
creator: wrowe@apache.org

text:
Very strange. I downloaded a fresh copy, installed it, and it worked! I did 
nothing this time that I had not done before - previously it failed to start 
the service after installation, now it does not. Go figure!
creator: tony@marston-home.demon.co.uk
